original_text: I will cause more and more Israelite people to live on you, and in all the land. They will live in the towns and they will repair the broken buildings.
korean_text: 내가 또 사람을 너희 위에 많게 하리니 이들은 이스라엘 온 족속이라 그들을 성읍들에 거주하게 하며 빈 땅에 건축하게 하리라

sentences.original_text: I will cause more and more Israelite people
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 점점 더 많은 이스라엘 백성을

sentences.original_text: They will live in the towns
and they will repair the broken buildings
